alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 10:50PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lake and north central Missoula Counties through 1115 PM MDT... At 1049 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ronan, or 18 miles south of Polson, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half-inch size hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ronan, St. Ignatius, Allentown, Kicking Horse, Condon, Charlo, Fort Connah and Salmon Prairie. This includes the following highways... Highway 83 between mile markers 38 and 49. Highway 93 between mile markers 32 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region
